headline: City's Clinics for Birth Control And Maternal Care Expanded

headline: U.S. AIDING TEXAS IN BIRTH CONTROL; Federal Funds Likely to Be Given Other Applicants
text: WASHINGTON, Jan. 5 -- Federal funds to assist local communities in birth control programs have been made available to one city and are likely to be granted to others.

headline: DOUBTS SINCERITY OF STRATON ACTION; Atheist's Attorney Says Pastor Is a Bigot if He Is Annoyed by Smith's Letters. MINISTER CROSS-EXAMINED Calls Birth Control Offensive and Resents Challenge to Debate.
text: The good faith of the Rev. Dr. John Roach Straton in prosecuting Charles Smith, President of the American Society for the Advancement of Atheism, was questioned yesterday before Magistrate Gotlieb in the Jefferson Market Court.

headline: BIRTH CONTROL AND RACE.

headline: SEE PERIL TO RACE IN BIRTH CONTROL; Eugenists in New Book Also Call Lack of It in Inferior Groups Dangerous.  BUILDER TYPES' NEEDED The Well-Balanced, Intelligent and Healthy Are on the Decrease, the Writers Say.

headline: CONDEMN 2 IRISH FILMS.; Newark Hibernians Also Oppose Birth Control and Some Textbooks.
text: 300 at Newark condemn films ridiculing Irish

headline: BARS BIRTH CONTROL TALK.; Boston Censor Acts to Prevent Speech by Atheist Leader.
text: Boston bans talk on birth control by C Smith, Pres Amer Assn for the Advancement of Atheism, Inc

headline: WOMEN FOR BIRTH CONTROL; It Makes for National Efficiency, English Association Holds.
text: Women's Natl Liberal Fed (British) approves control

headline: HEARING IN AN UPROAR.; Charge Involving Doctors Resented at Birth Control Discussion.
text: ALBANY, March 1. -- A hearing before the Assembly Codes Committee on a bill which would permit physicians to impart birth control information came near breaking up in a row at the Capitol today.

headline: BIRTH CONTROL LAW URGED; Mrs. F.R. Jones Says It Would Reduce Housing Congestion.
text: Mrs F R Jones urges birth control law as remedy

headline: ATTACK BIRTH CONTROL.; British Physicians Declare All Known Methods Injurious.
text: LONDON, Feb. 9. -- Eight distinguished British physicians have contributed to a volume on birth control in which it is declared that, achieved by any known method, it has damaging effects. It is said to cause neurasthenia.

headline: BIRTH CONTROL GROUP CUTS BUDGET

headline: Pills for Birth Control Seized as Counterfeit
text: The Food and Drug Administration has seized more than 330,000 counterfeit birth-control pills from two distributors on Long Island as part of a nationwide effort to remove the pills from the market.   Donald McLearn, a spokesman for the F.D.A.,...

headline: Pills for Birth Control Are Recalled by Searle
text: The pharmaceutical manufacturer G. D. Searle is recalling more than a million birth control pills because low-strength counterfeit versions, which may not prevent pregnancy, have been distributed, the Food and Drug Administration said today.   ...

headline: 2d Birth Control Center Firebombed in Georgia

headline: STUDY LINKING BIRTH CONTROL PILL TO BREAST CANCER IS ATTACKED
text: A study linking an ingredient in birth control pills to breast cancer is being criticized by other researchers, months after it was published in a prestigious British medical journal.   The national Centers for Disease Control and Boston...

headline: U.S. DEFENDING NOTIFYING PARENTS ON BIRTH CONTROL
text: The Reagan Administration is again defending its effort to require birth control clinics to notify parents of minors receiving prescription contraceptives, even though four Federal courts have struck down the rule as illegal.    The Administration...
